# Bestial (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* | [[Karaan]], Yeenoghu. |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** Character gains the scent extraordinary ability.

**Bestial Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Magic Fang (Spell)|Magic Fang]]****:** One natural weapon of subject creature gets +1 bonus on attack and damage rolls.

**2** **[[Bull's Strength (Spell)|Bull’s Strength]]****:** Subject gains 1d4+1 Str for 1 hr./level.

**3** **[[Magic Fang, Greater (Spell)|Magic Fang, Greater]]****:** One natural weapon of subject creature gets +1 bonus on attack and damage rolls per 3 caster levels (max +5).

**4** **[[Claws of the Savage (Spell)|Claws of the Savage]]****:** Subject gains claws that deal damage based on size.

**5** **[[Charm Monster (Spell)|Charm Monster]]****:** Makes monster believe it is your character’s ally.

**6** **[[Hold Monster (Spell)|Hold Monster]]****:** As *[[Hold Person (Spell)|hold person]]*, but any creature.

**7** **[[Whirlwind of Teeth (Spell)|Whirlwind of Teeth]]****:** Creates moving 5-ft./level cylinder that deals 1d8 damage/2 levels each round.

**8** **[[Spread of Savagery (Spell)|Spread of Savagery]]****:** Creatures within 10 ft./level become hostile and savage.

**9** **[[Were-Doom (Spell)|Were-Doom]]****:** 1d4 creatures infected with lycanthropy.
